thread.section_title: The House Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The House | www.the-house.com
thread.title: Michael Kogan
thread.title_full: The House reviewed by Michael Kogan

author: Michael Kogan
title: Michael Kogan
text:
I ordered bike from the-house.com, and received not the one I ordered because online description was wrong.
Why 5 stars?
Because they admitted the mistake right away, refunded product cost, shipping charges and paid for return shipping. No hassles.
Everybody make mistakes, not everybody admits them. Thank you!
